description:
This creek and river runner is made for extreme racers chasing short-boat glory on the Green, Oetz or Ottawa. The Dragon is quick, precise and forgiving. A flat bow profile channels water under the boat to help you get up to hull speed fast. The asymmetric form, narrow beam and continuous rocker help you stay there.

  • Made of high-density polyethylene that is super strong for better performance and a faster feel
  • Reactor outfitting system for comfort and functionality
  • Built-in thigh braces for a stiffer top deck
  • Adjustable seat pad for all-day comfort
  • HipFlex System with 3-way ratchet backband, to hold you in place via 3 contact points
  • Heel and toe foot pods add control, regardless of your size
  • Bulkhead can be expanded for optimal safety and comfort
name: Titan Kayaks Dragon Kayak
